name: ScarPoX / Runcms / E-xoops
short_description: A comprehensive content management system (CMS) whit ease of use, speed, & flexibility. E-Xoops 1.05r3 was last version call E-XooPS. Name change and release of RunCms 1.4 got Us to level 2. Level 3 Scarpox is a more compact cms exclusive to Danish use.
